channel.title: How to Force Onion Addresses in Tor Browser v8.0.4
channel.description:
I'm trying to figure out how to [force onions in my tor browser](http://dds6qkxpwdeubwucdiaord2xgbbeyds25rbsgr73tbfpqpt4a6vjwsyd.onion/wiki/Forcing_.onion_on_Whonix.org).
Step 2 says select the "add a rule for this site" button. But this option isn't present in my version of HTTPSEverywhere (v2018.10.31). Am I getting something wrong? How do we force onions in the current version of TBB?
![httpseverywhere|369x428](upload://gEOLQCYgi3v0nP2BxNc7U5LYbUu.png)

item.title: How to Force Onion Addresses in Tor Browser v8.0.4
item.dc:creator: 0brand
item.description:
gi971:

Step 2 says select the “add a rule for this site” button. But this option isn’t present in my version of HTTPSEverywhere (v2018.10.31).

Works for me.

Step 1 1/2 says “Try browsing to a non-onion site before trying to create a ruleset”

Try browsing to this site and create a ruleset. ( its a https://URI not a .onion)

https://qubes-os.org

Related:

I can’t power on my laptop after I power it on.

Read full topic
item.source: How to Force Onion Addresses in Tor Browser v8.0.4

item.title: How to Force Onion Addresses in Tor Browser v8.0.4
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
Tor Browser is provided by Tor Project so https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Free_Support_Principle applies.

Read full topic
